Articles.Content:
I've been wanting to build Voyager-esque probes, where the RTS is on a boom that obviously had to be extended after launch.

The large ISS-style solar panels are a good proof that it can be done...

If there has been one done, I apologize for the request, but I haven't been able to find it.

Thanks!

LackLusterLabs has some small, animated, extendable RTG's, with and without cases. i can't remember if they are in the LLL full, lite or SXT version

The US probes may also have some, but i can't get that mod to load for some reason
